title: Erwin Bronz Facepak for Wear
summary: Watch face for the Moto360, LG G Watch R or any round face**READ. DESCRIPTION.
description: **********THIS APP NEEDS THE APP "FACE", NOT "FACER" (Read below)To use, Download this, and apply the watchface through the apphttp://goo.gl/qRCR7RJoin the community too.http://goo.gl/EDGkmBIf you still have troubles, Contact meMainly a watch face for the Moto 360 (or moto360) or the LG G Watch R, or any round face, but I could eventually do square ones if more people request themAny changes/updates I make will be updated in the app where you can update when I publish a new versionI'll work on the small dials in a bit, for now you can at least see the time.Email me if you have any requests for a watch face
descriptionHTML:
**********THIS APP NEEDS THE APP "FACE", NOT "FACER" (Read below)

To use, Download this, and apply the watchface through the app
http://goo.gl/qRCR7R
Join the community too.
http://goo.gl/EDGkmB
If you still have troubles, Contact me

Mainly a watch face for the Moto 360 (or moto360) or the LG G Watch R, or any round face, but I could eventually do square ones if more people request them


Any changes/updates I make will be updated in the app where you can update when I publish a new version

I'll work on the small dials in a bit, for now you can at least see the time.

Email me if you have any requests for a watch face
comments: Nice but Needs a black background, not white, as on my LG G R wear when it saves from screen burn by moving the face about a bit every minute you notice the white around the edges and the clock stays white as well.
Would like it but....... The face looks unaligned with a strange white square boarder. (moto 360)
recentChanges: Updated some stuff, added date, some dials, etc
